summary: "The Stand" is a popular book by Stephen King about a deadly flu pandemic. After the disease, survivors join groups led by good or evil leaders. King wrote it in 1978, and it was updated in 1990 with extra content. The book is very long, but it became a top seller and is considered one of King's best works. It has been adapted into TV shows and comics. The story is like a modern version of "The Lord of the Rings," with lots of characters and an exciting plot.
title: The Stand
